string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Myth or Fact: Rape is a crime of uncontrollable sexual passion or urge
Myth or Fact: Rape is defined as a sexual crime committed by strangers
Myth or Fact: Only women can be victims of sexual violence.
Myth or Fact: In order for a situation to be considered rape, the victim must fight back physically.
Myth or Fact: If a person goes to another person’s room and “makes out,” it means that she/he wants to have sex.
